name: Brick Breaker Extreme!
description:
Brick Breaker Extreme! takes the original Arkanoid/Breakout design and adds a twist to it--literally!

Maneuver your paddle cleverly to add extra spin to the ball and gain complete control over its trajectory. For an added challenge, try out EXTREME mode: all walls are replaced with paddles, the bricks get smaller, and the ball spins even faster!

Beat all 6 levels to prove yourself a brick-breaking master!

(Created for the "Learn to code by making games" Udemy course)
